name: Sonic Legacy
overview: Sonic Legacy is a fairly simple hack of Sonic the Hedgehog 2, with every level being edited to some degree, with scripted event-heavy levels receiving the fewest edits due to lack of ASM skills and overall inexperience with Sonic hacking. FEATURES: • Custom music • Per-Act song changes • Changes to 6 of the 7 Special Stages (The editor for these is very limited, so they might be a bit messy.) • Some bits of new artwork
